channel.title: Comments on: Philosophy As Interdisciplinary Intensity – An Interview With Giorgio Agamben (Antonio Gnolio/Ido Govrin)
channel.description: E-SUPPLEMENT TO THE JOURNAL FOR CULTURAL AND RELIGIOUS THEORY

item.title: By: Khashayar Beigi
item.dc:creator: Khashayar Beigi
item.description: Nice conceptualization of philosophy, but to be exact and fair - intensity is a Deleuzian concept, or at least its re-invigoration owes much to him.
item.content:encoded: Nice conceptualization of philosophy, but to be exact and fair – intensity is a Deleuzian concept, or at least its re-invigoration owes much to him.
